text: Lokman Hossain Fakir (27 Dec 1934 – 23 April 1991) was a Bangladeshi musician. Government of Bangladesh awarded him the first Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Music Director in 1975 for Choritrohin (1975) jointly with Debu Bhattacherjee. He was also awarded the Ekushey Padak in 2003 posthumously for his contribution to music. ==Career== Fakir joined Bangladesh Betar in 1960 as an artist. == References == ==External links== * Category:1934 births Category:1991 deaths Category:People from Tangail District Category:Bangladeshi film score composers Category:Recipients of the Ekushey Padak Category:Recipients of the National Film Awards (Bangladesh)
